item.title: Live updates: Congress set to count, certify Trump’s electoral college victory over Harris
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and the new Congress.

item.title: Column: In total, Jan. 6 rioters have been sentenced to 1,300 years in prison
Trump tries to block sentencing in New York hush money case
item.description: Lawyers for Donald Trump asked a New York judge to stop Trump’s sentencing scheduled for Friday on his convictions for falsifying business documents.
